property.description: How many times the proxies in TonyClient should retry on connection failure. Note that this controls the number of retries from the retry policy, not the internal Hadoop IPC client, e.g. if your IPC client is configured to retry 50 times via ipc.client.connect.max.retries and tony.application.num-rm-connect-retries is set to 1, the retry policy will try to connect once, but the IPC client will still try to connect 50 times.
property.name: tony.application.num-client-rm-connect-retries
